text: Atlanta’s Loss On Sunday Opens Up the NFC Wild Card Race https://t.co/gTIfugFgn6 https://t.co/c6HexQgRAk
Still baffled on how the Falcons lost yesterday
Defense plays a great game giving up only 14 points and making big plays at big times. But offense drops the ball once again
And the Falcons end up losing again. 24-21
@drorange23 it's frustrating but the first interception was not a pick and he made one terrible mistake aside from that he was good
Well Matt Ryan has got some making up to do. falcons trail 24-21 with 53 seconds remaining
How many opposing fans and teams have prayed that Adam Vinateri would miss a clutch kick...
And the defense once again nails the offense out again. Falcons ball with 6:43 in the fourth all tied at 21-21
Matt Ryan makes an awful mistake. Pick 6
Defense holds, but Colts pin Falcons inside their own one yard line
@MyHoSoFabuloso yes I'm aware
Saw that interception coming. Can't challenge trufant man on man with a safety over the top. Another big play by the Falcons defense
But Ricardo Allen gets a huge interception in the end zone! Falcons take over forcing another turnover!
And Tevin Coleman has a costly fumble at the end of the third quarter. Colts ball in Falcons territory
Ryan hits Hankerson for a three yard TD! Falcons lead 21-7 with 9:38 in the 3rd
Falcons lead Colts at halftime 14-7. Have to have this game
Falcons add to the lead! DiMarco gets another TD and we lead 14-0!
Ryan hits Jones on a long pass. Said it earlier, Falcons will take more risks this game
Bad news: Devonta Freeman OUT with a concussion
Falcons score from Ryan to DiMarco pass. 7-0 Falcons
Babs creating penetration on third and one on Gore run, causing negative yardage and Falcons get ball back
And Matt throws an INT that was upheld. Looked imcomplete, and now Falcons D right back on the field
Falcons up +2 in turnover battle right now. O'Brien with the strip, Worrilow with the recovery
And Bryant misses the 47 yard field goal. What an odd year for him
Worrilow with the INT! Win the turnover battle, win the game.
Colts receive ball first, Falcons get ball to start second half
Defense needs to get pressure on Hasselback (last in league in sacks), win the turnover battle, and rush defense needs to contain Gore.
Look for a different offensive mindset. Predicting we will be more balanced, some no-huddle, and take more risks than normal.
Huge game today. Would be 7-3 with a win, and playing Panthers twice and Vikings next Sunday, Falcons need this game.
